page.title: 17TRAFFIC NEAR GILLING WEST
page.content: Gilling is situated near the{A66}north of Scotch Corner.The{A66 is very busy because it is a major road leading to Scotland. We went to the top of Gilling Bank and did a traffic count. In half an hour we counted{139 {vehicles travelling North}and{147 {vehicles going South.}Some of the traffic was travelling very fast. Our local Parish Council is very concerned about the{speed of traffic at the{Gilling turn-off.}The Parish Council want a{deceleration lane}on the A66 where the{Gilling/Melsonby {road}crosses at present. This would make{traffic flow more easily, and {safely,}to and from Gilling. Before this can happen the necessary land has to be purchased. The Parish Council hope that this scheme will be started in{1986.
